\section{Work Experience}

\cventry{Summer 2017}{Software Engineering Intern}{WePay}{California}{}{
    \begin{itemize}
        \item Create and modify several REST APIs (using Dropwizard and Flask) and Angular interfaces to interact with them.
        \item Create an Angular interface to visualize transaction states on a graph.
    \end{itemize}
}

\cventry{2016 - 2017}{Peer Teacher}{Department of Computer Science}{Texas A\&M University}{}{
    \begin{itemize}
        \item Support six professors in their course load by mentoring and tutoring hundreds of students in computer science courses.
        \item Assist students one-on-one with debugging and analyzing their C++, Java, and Haskell programs in office hours.
        \item Selected to lead weekly review lessons on discrete mathematics.
    \end{itemize}
}
\cventry{2016 - Present}{Undergraduate Research Assistant}{Department of Computer Science}{Texas A\&M University}{}{
    \begin{itemize}
        \item Research parametrized algorithms for hard problems.
        \item Research approximation algorithms for the Line-Cover Problem.
        \item Attend weekly meetings with graduate students and professors to discuss research and complexity theory.
    \end{itemize}
}
\cventry{2015 - 2016}{Undergraduate Research Assistant}{Department of Mathematics}{Texas A\&M University}{}{
    \begin{itemize}
        \item Analyzed sound quality of vinyls from before and after RIAA standardization to improve sound quality in old recordings (2015).
        \item Published a \href{https://arxiv.org/abs/1702.06093}{paper} describing a formula to determine the total number of different transposition decompositions of a permutation cycle (2016).
        \item Developed a program to compute the entries and eigensystem of the integer partition matrix.
    \end{itemize}
}
\cventry{2015 - 2016}{Student Assistant}{Department of Mathematics}{Texas A\&M University}{}
{
    \begin{itemize}
        \item Graded homework and exams for multivariate calculus class of over 90 students.
    \end{itemize}
}
\cventry{Summer 2016}{SMaRT Camp Counselor}{Department of Mathematics}{Texas A\&M University}{}{
    \begin{itemize}
        \item Served as a counselor at a two-week math camp for twenty gifted high school students from around the country.
        \item Taught students how to make formal proofs and introduced them to advanced mathematics topics.
    \end{itemize}
}
